article_title: US Senate candidate Thom Tillis reverses course, urges NC to consider expanding Medicaid
article_text: NC House Speaker Thom Tillis, who is running for US Senate, changes his position on expanding Medicaid as state leaders across the country who once rejected the idea – along with the federal dollars that came with it – face increasing pressure to reverse course and expand the program that provides medical care to the poor.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Thom Tillis, North Carolina, Kay Hagan, Senate, politics, Medicaid, flip-flops, Sean Haugh
